title.en: One-Year Anniversary Guest Shift | Eric Pan
title.zh: Bar Lafin 一周年客座活动 | Eric Pan

description.en: Eric Pan from AlmostTea, Chengdu will take over the Bar Lafin at its one-year anniversary.
description.zh: 🍸茶不多的调酒师 Eric Pan将在Bar Lafin一周年纪念日这天掌管吧台

description.en: Grand opening on May 1st: Bozhou Wine Shop! Founded by a native of Guizhou, serving authentic Guizhou snacks × creative cocktails.
description.zh: 5月1日，播洲酒家盛大开业！贵州籍创始人倾情呈现地道贵州小吃与创意鸡尾酒——吃点家常菜，喝点家常酒

title.en: Chengdu SKP X Guangzhou Miao Qian Ice Room: Hope & Seasame
title.zh: 成都SKP X 广州庙前冰室 Hope & Seasame

description.en: From May 1 to 3, SKP is teaming up with the mixologist from Hope & Sesame—ranked #14 in Asia’s Top 50 Bars—to immerse you in a dreamy bubble ocean and have you grooving to pulsing EDM!
description.zh: 5月1日至3日，SKP携手亚洲50佳酒吧第14名Hope & Sesame的资深调酒师，带您沉浸在梦幻泡泡海洋中，并随着动感电音尽情摇摆！

description.en: On May 4 and 5, SKP is featuring Tommy, founder of CMYK—ranked #43 among Asia’s Best Bars—to deliver a bubble party
description.zh: 5月4日至5日，SKP特邀亚洲最佳酒吧第43名CMYK品牌主理人Tommy，带您震撼泡泡派对
